content.description: <math alttext="2 A l solid plus F e 2 O 3 solid react to produce 2 F e solid plus A l 2 O 3 solid. delta H naught equals negative 850 kilojoules per mole of reaction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>Al</mtext><mo>(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>Fe</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>→</mo><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>Fe</mtext><mo>(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>Al</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>)</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="2.0em"></mspace><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msup><mrow><mi>H</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>°</mi></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>850</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mtext>kJ/mol</mtext></mrow><mrow><mi>r</mi><mi>x</mi><mi>n</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>
content.question: The chemical equation shown above represents the thermite reaction. What is the approximate amount of heat released when <math alttext="108 grams" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>108</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>g</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of <math alttext="A l solid" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Al</mtext><mo>(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> reacts with excess <math alttext="F e 2 O 3 solid" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>Fe</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
